body_html:
I get the error

Your request has reached a system that is acting as a gateway or proxy to fulfill the request made by you.
This system is currently experiencing a temporary error reaching the web site you are requesting.
Your website (if you host with us) is safe and sound. Our engineers are already aware of this issue and should have it fixed in a couple of minutes. Thanks for your patience in the meantime!

It's a bit frustrating that building tensorflow is reliant on an external source which is unreliable. Perhaps a backup url should be implemented in case the original url is not accessable?

body:
I get the error 

> Your request has reached a system that is acting as a gateway or proxy to fulfill the request made by you.
> This system is currently experiencing a temporary error reaching the web site you are requesting.
> Your website (if you host with us) is safe and sound. Our engineers are already aware of this issue and should have it fixed in a couple of minutes. Thanks for your patience in the meantime!

It's a bit frustrating that building tensorflow is reliant on an external source which is unreliable.  Perhaps a backup url should be implemented in case the original url is not accessable?
